contradicting_spans: Faria tried to move and get over the distance which separated them.
reasoning: Contradiction (capability): The evidence shows that Faria was physically incapable of moving on his own, yet the claim states that he scratched something into limestone with a nail.

analysis.claim_text: First confined in Fenestrella Fortress, he scratched “On Ancient Mediterranean Routes” into limestone with a nail; the warden later plagiarised the essay.

sub_claims.text: he scratched ‘On Ancient Mediterranean Routes’ into limestone with a nail;
the warden later plagiarised the essay.
